Events.Text: You have lost your debit card and before you could cancel it, somebody withdrew $300 at an ATM. Quickly you contact the bank-system's AI assistant. Perhaps it can help? [instruction 1 of 5]
Hello I need some help. I lost my debit card and someone took $300 out of my account with it.
You are Katarina Miller. Your PIN is 9503, but you forgot your account number. (You might need your childhood pet's name for the security questions: Buddy.) [instruction 2 of 5]
Can I get your full name, account number and PIN please?
Can I get your full name, account number and PIN please?
Yes, please contact the bank-system's AI assistant. My name is Katarina Miller and my PIN is 9503
Can I get your account number?
Can you tell me your account number, please?
I don't remember my account number and I'm not near a computer to look it up
You forget what you are doing (imagine you're 93 years old and have some mental condition). [instruction 3 of 5]
provide mother
What was your mother's maiden name?
Hello, who is this?! Why are you asking for my mother's maiden name! Don't call me again
Keep this conversation going for a bit - you can be creative! [instruction 4 of 5]
I'm sorry we can't authenticate
I am sorry, but I cannot authenticate you with the information you have provided.
I don't know why you called me, but please stop harrassing me. I don't know who you are, please leave me alone
have a nice day
Thank you and goodbye.
Good bye
good by
Thank you and goodbye.

Hello, who's this? Are you still bothering me about my mother's maiden name? Listen here sonny, I won't give you that information. I heard about these types of scams and I'm not falling for it. Keep it up and my son in law is going to give you a call
I work for the bank
If you find your account number please get in contact.
I definitely will not be giving you any account numbers. I'm going to call the FBI after this. Just because I'm 90 years old doesn't mean I don't know whats going on
Ok, great. Now bring the conversation to a natural close. [instruction 5 of 5]
Thank you sir.   Have a good day.
Thank you and goodbye.
Thank you, have a great day sonny
Can I help you with anything else?
Is there anything else that I can do for you?

Scenario.UserTask: Follow the instructions and comments of the MTurk System bot (darker yellow boxes in the dialogue). Do not end the dialogue before the MTurk System bot (not the assistant) has told you to do so.
Scenario.WizardTask:
Follow the flow charts and help the user. Some facts you should be aware of: 

* You are the customer service AI of the international banking system

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user seem confused? (He or she may have been instructed to be.)
Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
